mission.title: Continuum Mission
mission.description: Use Immortalized Crew to ensure the Continuum stays on the correct path. (Placeholder)

potential_rewards.name: Quantum Energy
potential_rewards.flavor: Quantum--a mortal term for Q energy--is needed in order to retrieve crew. Quantum will regenerate over time, but the Q can only hold so much at a time. Plan your crew retrieval operations in order to make efficient use of this resource. Quantum can be regenerated instantly in exchange for Dilithium.

potential_rewards.name: Dilithium
potential_rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

potential_rewards.name: Kellin
potential_rewards.flavor: Kellin was a tracer and caught fugitives until she fell in love and ran away herself. But the circle is closed - she returns to Ramura.

action.name: I've Violated One Of Our Most Important Edicts

quests.name: Bravery in Action
quests.description: The Taranko colony is under attack! Repel the last of the Romulan invaders and help the colonists recover.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

reward.name: Science Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: A Question of Rights
quests.description: Vissian cogenitors are also being sold off by the Orion. Opinions on Vissian culture aside, cogenitors cannot be bought and sold.

rewards.name: B. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Basic Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: 10x S. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: 10 Standard Boosts. Go to Time Portal to collect!

reward.name: Diplomacy Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

rewards.name: P. Shuttle
rewards.flavor: A Premium Boost. Go to Time Portal to collect!

quests.name: Organian Aid
quests.description: The Organians possess the unique ability to detect rifts in the spacetime continuum. Convince them the reward will be worth the physical cost.

challenges.name: Show Results of Inaction in Holodeck

quests.name: The Annihilation Syndrome
quests.description: Capture the Tantalus Device replication facility. If the Terran Empire makes enough of these horrifying weapons, they could become invincible.
